about_the_game:
You've always known that your keen sense of smell is your greatest talent. However, you're a doe which makes the art of perfumery not exactly the most traditional profession for your kind. Luckily, you've found a mentor who couldn't care less about societal pressures and has taken you under her wing. After two years of working as her assistant, you're now ready to create fragrances on your own. Yet, you don't expect just how deep the waters will be...

The most important sense in the animal kingdom is the sense of smell, particularly here on the Palent planet, where it plays a key role in communication, camouflage, healing, and many other essential functions. Palent is predominantly inhabited by highly intelligent animals, whose level of technological development resembles that of the 18th- to 19th-century Earth. Peace has long prevailed here, but recent rumors speak of unknown species of lizards disrupting the established order. Where have they come from? 

  • Your story is presented as an adventure text-based game, enriched with hand-drawn illustrations and an interactive map.

  • You embark on a long journey, using the scents you create, discovering new places, and meeting unique characters.

  • The game draws inspiration from such genres as interactive fiction, visual novel, adventure, crafting, and RPG. 

  • It is filled with secret nuances, rabbit holes, and additional puzzles, creating a rich, multidimensional experience that will leave you hungry for more.

  • Scent of Clouds is an independent game created by a single person, Coderose, featuring an original storyline, graphics, and music.

name: Scent of Clouds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 2.4ghz Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 260 GTS or Radeon HD 4850 - 512 MB of VRAM or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 2.66GHz Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 460 GTX / Radeon 5770 - 1 GB of VRAM or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Scent of Clouds is a hand-drawn illustrated, text-based adventure game. As a perfumer's assistant, you create fragrances and journey through unknown lands in search of ingredients for the legendary "Scent of Clouds." With a keen nose, you'll unravel the timeless mystery of this world.
